meanings.definition: The act of dying or ceasing to live.
meanings.sent1: The dyings of the flowers in winter are sad.
meanings.sent2: The doctor tried to prevent the dyings of his patients.
meanings.sent3: The dyings of the battery made the toy car stop moving.
meanings.sent4: The dyings of the fire left only ashes behind.
meanings.sent5: The dyings of the stars at dawn painted the sky with colors.

meanings.definition: The process of coming to an end or fading away.
meanings.sent1: The dyings of the music could be heard as the party ended.
meanings.sent2: The dyings of the day signaled the arrival of night.
meanings.sent3: The dyings of the laughter slowly quieted the room.
meanings.sent4: The dyings of the waves on the shore calmed the beach.
meanings.sent5: The dyings of the wind whispered through the trees.
